name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Product Engineer with 9+ years of expertise in Mechanical and Electrical Engineering, specializing in Fault Diagnosis and Technical Reporting. Proficient in using **MS Excel** to analyze data and generate comprehensive reports. Possesses strong Organizational and Interpersonal Skills, enabling effective collaboration with cross-functional teams to enhance customer support and product outcomes. Additionally skilled in developing applications using **.NET**, **C#**, **ReactJS**, and **NextJS**, with practical experience in **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis**. Proven track record of delivering robust engineering solutions and optimizing processes.

experience.responsibilities:
Provided technical support and fault diagnosis for mechanical and electrical systems, improving resolution times by 30%.
Crafted detailed technical reports to communicate findings and recommendations, enhancing information dissemination across the team.
Utilized MS Excel to analyze data trends, optimizing processes and improving reporting accuracy by 25%.
Excelled in customer support, effectively addressing client inquiries and concerns, resulting in a 15% increase in customer satisfaction ratings.
Demonstrated exceptional organizational skills, managing multiple projects concurrently, ensuring timely completion within deadlines.
Built and maintained strong interpersonal relationships with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to facilitate seamless collaboration on product development.
Leveraged innovative engineering principles to optimize product designs and processes, directly contributing to a **10% reduction** in production costs.
Implemented quality control measures into the engineering process, leading to a **20% decrease** in product defects.
Standardized training materials and technical documentation, enhancing onboarding processes for new engineers.

- Demonstrated strong **Technical Reporting** skills by documenting engineering processes and product specifications accurately, leading to improved project clarity.
- Leveraged **MS Excel** for analytical reporting, resulting in enhanced data interpretation and decision-making efficiency.
- Employed **Organizational Skills** to manage multiple projects simultaneously, delivering on time and ensuring optimal resource allocation, which improved project turnaround by **20%**.
- Applied **Interpersonal Skills** to collaborate with cross-functional teams, facilitating effective communication and alignment between engineering and product managers, contributing to a seamless product development cycle.
- Conducted fault diagnosis on mechanical and electrical systems, utilizing a systematic approach to problem-solving that resulted in a **95%** success rate for troubleshooting.
- Provided exceptional **Customer Support**, addressing technical queries and resolving issues effectively, which increased customer satisfaction ratings by **15%**.
- Developed training materials and conducted sessions on product usage and maintenance, improving client onboarding experience by **30%**.
- Utilized expertise in **Mechanical Engineering** and **Electrical Engineering** principles to enhance product design, resulting in a **10%** reduction in manufacturing costs.
- Successfully led initiatives that merged engineering insights with consumer feedback, driving product enhancements and market fit, resulting in a **50%** increase in user adoption.
- Collaborated with quality assurance teams to ensure all products met compliance standards and performance benchmarks pre-launch.

Utilized **MS Excel** for data analysis and fault diagnosis, increasing reporting accuracy by **30%**.
